body_html: Wouldn't it still be better to have a fused index_add_ + mul for the backward than implementing a specific double backward? I'd think that it is probably a bit less code and more similar to what we do for other ops.
body_text: Wouldn't it still be better to have a fused index_add_ + mul for the backward than implementing a specific double backward? I'd think that it is probably a bit less code and more similar to what we do for other ops.
body: Wouldn't it still be better to have a fused index_add_ + mul for the backward than implementing a specific double backward? I'd think that it is probably a bit less code and more similar to what we do for other ops.
